sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均含有"问，询问"之意。
means: ask ：最普通用词，可与demand, inquire和question换用，但ask用于口语中，指提出问题让人回答。
demand ：指根据自己的权利、职责或身份认为有必要弄清情况而正式发问，常隐含命令对方回答的意味。
inquire ：较正式用词，指为得到真实情况而详细询问或调查了解。
question ：指因感到可疑或为了解情况，弄清究竟而发问，有时指一连串的发问。

sentence.Network_en: Inspectors were appointed to inquire into the affairs of the company.
sentence.Network_cn: 督查员受委派调查该公司的事务。

sentence.Network_en: Elsie called to inquire after my health.
sentence.Network_cn: 埃尔茜打电话来问候我。

sentence.Network_en: You can inquire of your new neighbors where the post office is.
sentence.Network_cn: 你可以问问你的新邻居邮局在哪儿.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 叩_百度百科 ... 叩头、拜〖 kowtow〗 举发；询问〖 expose；inquire〗 攻打〖 attack〗.
新概念第二册单词表(附音标)_百度知道 ... require 要求，需要，命令 inquire 询问，打听，调查 wire (一根根的)电线.
TOEIC词汇汇总 ... forward 转寄；发送 11. inquire 调查；询问 12. jot down 略记下；匆匆记下 13.
怎么回复寻盘- - 阿里巴巴商人论坛 ... be worried at sth. 对……苦恼 inquire 询盘；询价；询购 to inquire about 对...询价.

list.abs: 《费城问询报》（Philadelphia Inquirer）：这部叙事电影，内容有点异想天开。 　　《华盛顿邮报》（Washington Post）：剧情试图推 …
寻_百度百科 ... 寻找[ look of;search;seek] 探究；研究；推求[ study;rearch;inquire into] 继续[ continue].
费城询问报（PHILADELPHIA INQUIRER）：最近在流行乐坛打开了一道裂缝…为一位带著鲜明旋律段落而来的女性创作歌手而开， …
after的翻译查词例句词组大耳朵英语 ... ask after 问候 inquire after 问候 ever after 从此以后一直.
大学英语四级常用词组 ... inquire about 询问，打听 inquire after 问起(某人)的健康情况 inquire for 询问(商店、地点等).

jx.jx_en_mean: To ask about the health or condition of.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English enquere (later inquere), from Old French enquerre, from a variant of Latin inquirere, based on quaerere 'seek'. The spelling with in-, influenced by Latin, dates from the 15th cent

entry.def: If you inquire about something, you ask for information about it.

example.ex: 'Who are you?' he enquired of the first man...

entry.def: If you inquire into something, you investigate it carefully.

example.ex: Inspectors were appointed to inquire into the affairs of the company.
example.tran: 督查员受委派调查该公司的事务。

sentences.sentence: "He had to ask directions several times"

means.word_mean: 2. have a wish or desire to know something;

sentences.sentence: "He wondered who had built this beautiful church"

means.word_mean: 3. conduct an inquiry or investigation of;

sentences.sentence: "The district attorney's office investigated reports of possible irregularities"
"inquire into the disappearance of the rich old lady"

auth_sentence.content: I know my friends and family want me to inquire.

stems_affixes.word_buile: acquire获得;学到+ed……的→adj.后天习得的
acquire获得;学到+ment表名词→n.取得,习得;成就,造诣
en进入……之中+quir寻求,询问+y状态→n.询问

stems_affixes.value_cn: 需求, 要求, 必要条件, 需要的东西
stems_affixes.word_buile: require[v.需要;[of]要求,命令]+ment表名词→n.需求, 要求, 必要条件, 需要的东西

stems_affixes.value_cn: 获得;学到[知识等];养成[习惯]
stems_affixes.word_buile: ac加强动作+quir寻求,询问+e→寻求得到,获取
en进入……之中+quir寻求,询问+e→进入询问之中→询问
in进入+quir寻求,询问+e→问进去→盘问
re再+quir寻求,询问+e→再寻求→请求

sentences.en: The pilot inquired about the weather condition.
sentences.cn: 这飞行员查问天气情况。

sentences.en: I inquired the way to the station.
sentences.cn: 我打听去火车站怎么走。

sentences.en: I will inquire when to begin our lessons.
sentences.cn: 我要去问一下我们什么时候开始上课。
